import React from 'react' import "./contact.css" export default function Contact() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })); }; return (
